title: Storm Giant
contents: property | Saving Throws | Str +14, Con +10, Wis +9, Cha +9
property | Skills | Arcana +8, Athletics+ 14, History +8, Perception +9
description | Amphibious | The giant can breathe air and water.
description | Innate Spellcasting | The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
description | At will | detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
description | 3/day each | control weather, water breathing
description | Multiattack | The giant makes two greatsword attacks.
description | Greatsword | Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage.
description | Rock | Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

description | Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6) | The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description | Thunderous Stomp (Recharge 6) | The storm giant stomps the ground, triggering a thunderclap. All other creatures within 15 feet of the giant must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 33 (6dl 0) thunder damage and be deafened until the start of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. The thunderclap can be heard out to a range of 1,200 feet.
